maintenance_mode_description: Our potato team is currently working hard to fix the issue.Please try again later.
battle_result_waiting_label: We'll notify you when the result's out
result_popup_streak_complete: Wow, you completed your streak! Here's your reward
result_referral_battle_complete: Here’s your reward for inviting a friend to the app!
bottom_sheet_redeem_gift_details: Delivery takes between 4-8 weeks depending on your country. Shipping info will be sent to the email associated with your Potatomath account.
alert_unlock_avatar_subhead: Collect more potatoes to unlock this item
alert_onboarding_subhead: Use coins to enter challenges and earn potatoes and gems
dialog_signup_subhead: Here’s some free coins to start you off!
dialog_saved_card_heading: Would you like to remove the card?
dialog_saved_card_subhead: This action will automatically revoke any subscriptions that are currently active
dialog_referral_link_heading: Oh, seems like the referral link has reached its limit.
dialog_referral_link_subhead: No worries, here's free coins for signing up!
smart_action_new_feature: Hey there! We're working on new features. Tell us what you like!
smart_action_good_job: You completed {NUMBER_OF_QUIZZES} quizzes and earned {NUMBER_OF_POTATOES} potatoes in {TOPIC} last week. Keep it up!
smart_action_cheer_up: You’ve earned {NUMBER_OF_POTATOES} potatoes. Practice more to reach your first {NUMBER_OF_POTATOES} potatoes today!
smart_action_battle_friend: {FRIEND} earned {NUMBER_OF_POTATOES} potatoes in {TOPIC} today. Wanna prove you're better?
smart_action_friend_joined: Hey! {NEW_USER} got your invite. Now it’s time to shine and claim your free coins.
smart_action_progress_report: Hey, {USERNAME}! Here is the summary of your last week's progress. Check it out!
smart_action_practice: You’ve got over {WRONG_ANSWERS} unclaimed potatoes in {TOPIC}. Reclaim before they're gone forever!
howitworks_potatoes_description: Earn potatoes by entering math challenges using coins.
howitworks_coins_description: Buy coins or subscribe for unlimited coins and collect free coins each day.
howitworks_gems_description: Collect gems by completing streak challenges. Use the gems to redeem prizes in the gift store.
battle_result_message: {receive_user_name} has accepted your battle request, you {sender_battle-result} the challenge
